# Introduction

The 2nd edition of [Geocomputation with R](https://r.geocompx.org) is due to be published in 2024 and we're looking for a new cover image!

The first edition featured the following image by Marco Sciaini:

![](images/paste-2.png){height=500 fig-align="center"}

After some [iteration](https://github.com/geocompx/geocompr/issues/284) on this winning idea, the concept was refined, resulting in the following (see reproducible source code at [github.com/geocompx/geocompr/](https://github.com/geocompx/geocompr/blob/main/code/frontcover.R)):

![](images/paste-1.png)

This is now the official cover image for Geocomputation with R version 1:

![](images/paste-3.png)

# Competition

The competition is open to all, with the following rules:

- The image must be related to Geocomputation with R
- The winning image/concept must be based on reproducible code

The winner, selected by the authors of Geocomputation with R, will receive a $150 voucher for Taylor and Francis books, a copy of the book and will be credited in the book.
A runner up will receive a copy of the book.

# How to enter

To enter, please submit your idea via GitHub (by sharing your idea as a comment in [issue #980](https://github.com/geocompx/geocompr/issues/980)), social media or email [todo: add addresses and social media tags]
